title: Why Our Emotions Matter
itunes:title: Why Our Emotions Matter
description: In clinical settings, we often suppress our emotions, ignoring what is now considered a valuable professional dataset – yet harnessing the power of our emotional life helps improve so many aspects of our work from job satisfaction to patient outcomes. It’s only a matter of time until the industry pivots away from this seemingly learned habit. Dr. Marc Brackett, Director of the Yale Center for Emotional Intelligence and author of 'Permission to Feel,' explains how to tap into the crucial ability to use our emotions wisely.  And the very real price we pay when we don’t.
author: CVS Health
itunes:author: CVS Health
